text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day after training with<n>Maruzensky, another racer
timidly<n>approaches us.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uh... Um, excuse me! H-h-hi,<n>Maruzensky!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hello! Heheh, don't be so nervous.<n>You're Special Week,
right? The new<n>transfer student?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Y-yes! Um, um, your running is really<n>great! You run like
you've got plenty<n>of energy to spare, but you're so<n>fast...
I really want to run just like you<n>do!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Made me think that if I want to be the<n>top racer in all of
Japan, I need to be<n>that fast too!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: The top of Japan? My dear, is that<n>your dream?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, yes! It is!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I really want Mom and Mama to see<n>me become the
greatest racer in all of<n>Japan. That's why I left Hokkaido to<n>
come here!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I see...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well, that's great. I think it's a<n>wonderful dream. I hope you
make it<n>someday! I'll be cheering for you,<n>Spe! ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much! Um, i-if it's all<n>right... Could we run
together<n>sometime?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'd love to run with you! Please, it'd<n>mean so much!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: With me? Uh, let's see...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Let me go check my schedule! I'll let<n>you know ASAP.
Sound good?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh wow, of course! Okay, see you<n>later!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Catch you on the flip side. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ...Like me, huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later, Maruzensky seems to be lost<n>in the occasional
thought during our<n>training talk.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry. I lost focus. I've been<n>thinking circles about what
Spe said.
choice_data_list: She asked to run with you, right?
She asked to run with you, right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... I mean, I wouldn't mind at all,<n>you know? How could
I not help out a<n>cute little trainee?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But, you know... Spe has this crystal<n>clear dream of hers.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I can't imagine I'd be any help to a<n>bright-eyed kid like
that...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, sorry! It's so strange—I<n>always seem to get like this
when I'm<n>with you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, sorry! It's so strange—I<n>always seem to get like this
when I'm<n>with you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
She has faith in me, and as a role<n>model, I can't let her
down! Would it<n>be okay to go for that run with Spe?
choice_data_list: Sure, we can tell her together.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
She has faith in me, and as a role<n>model, I can't let her
down! Would it<n>be okay to go for that run with Spe?
choice_data_list: Sure, we can tell her together.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thanks. ♪ Then let's go find her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She sounds happy about it, but I see<n>some hesitancy in her
step. She must<n>still be unsure if she can live up to<n>younger
racers' aspirations.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But she needn't worry, because the<n>part of her Special
Week and the<n>others draw aspiration from is...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer? What's the hold up? Let's<n>get a move on!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer? What's the hold up? Let's<n>get a move on!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Getting to the point, we're on for a<n>pair run! How's this
evening sound?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's great! Thank you! I can't<n>believe I get to run
with the amazing<n>Maruzen... I won't let you down!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Now, now... You don't have to be so<n>serious, home skillet.
It's just me<n>after all.
choice_data_list: What about Maruzen do you like the most?
What about Maruzen do you like the most?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Uh, Trainer? What are you asking...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Uh, Trainer? What are you asking...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
You mean what do I admire most<n>about her? Well, obviously
she's a<n>really strong racer and all that...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But the biggest thing is... no matter the<n>race, she always
looks like she's<n>having fun!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
You know how racers in the Twinkle<n>Series inspire runners
everywhere?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I too came here to make my mom<n>proud and give people
hope... And I<n>think Maruzen does that better than<n>anyone.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She's strong, fast, and loves racing.<n>It's amazing to watch,
and so exciting!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Spe...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah, oh no! It's my turn to clean the<n>classroom today! Sorry,
gotta go! I<n>won't be late for our run though!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, s-sure. See you later.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer... you're really something.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer... you're really something.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ah, playing dumb, huh? Hmph, fine...<n>Geez, I can't believe
you though.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ah, playing dumb, huh? Hmph, fine...<n>Geez, I can't believe
you though.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
She said I give her hope and that my<n>joy for running
inspires her...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'll look totally uncool if I back out<n>after that!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky seems to be in a great<n>mood as she and
Special Week run<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant... Wow, you reallyare amazing... I can't catch up at all!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Watch carefully, Spe. I'm about to put<n>the pedal to the metal.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: We're just getting started!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wooow!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky shows the younger<n>racer an impressive run
before<n>returning.
